description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8h1b8","text":"This protocol allows one to convert ssDNA to dsDNA oligos. In principle, one can buy two complementary oligos and anneal them. However, there are a few cases where randomized bases are desired, and therefore complementary oligos can not be ordered. The protocol works similarly to PCR, except that the reaction is not performed at the high temperature of typical thermocycling, because the oligos are short and their melting temperature can be in the order of the extension temperature of high-fidelity polymerases. This protocol is therefore particularly useful when creating barcodes or when short dsDNA fragments containing degenerate bases are desired.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: Monarch PCR and DNA Cleanup Kit - 250 preps

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dr94q","text":"Design your target single-stranded DNA oligo such that the 3' end contains the reverse complement of an extending oligonucleotide. For example, appending \"GTCATAGCTGTTTCCTG\" to the end of your oligo will allow an oligonucleotide matching the M13 Reverse (-27) primer to extend it (5'-CAGGAAACAGCTATGAC-3').","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"db0qk","text":"Mix in a PCR tube   of a   stock of the target oligo with   of a   stock of the extending oligo. Add 27ul of molecular biology grade water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"figmp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"54EE1EE0104A11EEAA8809E48D8820A8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"5CA8BA50104A11EEAA8809E48D8820A8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"50E05ED0104A11EEAA8809E48D8820A8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"7785DD30104A11EEAA8809E48D8820A8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ff7rv","text":"Place the tube in a thermocycler and run the following protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atdue","text":"1. 95 degrees for 10 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ilo3","text":"2. Decrease by 1 degrees","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h34","text":"3. Repeat step 2 every 10 seconds, for 90 cycles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3f9j","text":"4. Hold at 4 degrees.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9eal","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f16ob","text":"Resuspend your oligonucleotides in 1/10th TE (10mM Tris, 0.1mM EDTA pH 8) to a final concentration of   to form your stock oligonucleotide solutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c6rvq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BCE6646015BA11EEA996AFEADAC9D8BE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"395en","text":"Make working oligonucleotide solutions by diluting the stock oligonucleotides to a final concentration of   in water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4fs4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C4D6DCE015BA11EEA996AFEADAC9D8BE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fded","text":"Add     (  stock) and mix well by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"7DAEBFA0104B11EEAA8809E48D8820A8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":3807,"mol_weight":0,"name":"dNTPs","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"8D2D6C60104B11EEAA8809E48D8820A8","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"A4B6F770104B11EEAA8809E48D8820A8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

When ready, start the protocol and pause when the block reaches 0 degrees (when Step 1 begins).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36cn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g36n","text":"1. 5 minutes at 0 degrees C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aofrt","text":"2. 5 minutes at 22 degrees C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9eoac","text":"3. 30 minutes at 37 degrees C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ut6f","text":"4. Hold at 0 degrees.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
